The image showing religious leaders hold: 2. The image was also posted on the official Facebook page of Gujarat Youth Congress.
A Facebook page called: 60 years of Congress" also posted the image with an identical text on April 5.
Alt News: a fact-checking organization, found that the image was photoshopped. The original image showed the religious leaders holding the Indian National flag, not the INC flag. The original picture was taken at Wagah Border, Amritsar in 2016 during a march of interfaith saints.
